item.title: Zsh插件之github使用
item.author: itboyer@qq.com (iTBoyer)
item.description: github插件 This plugin supports working with GitHub from the command line. It provides a few things: Sets up the hub wrapper and completions for the git command if you have hub installed. Completion for the github Ruby gem. Convenience functions for working with repos and URLs. Functions empty_gh - Creates a new empty repo (with a README.md) and pushes it to GitHub new_gh
